Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #34 South Michigan Temporary Northbound Reroute near Michigan/101st
ShortDescription: Northbound 34 South Michigan buses are rerouted via Michigan, 101st, State,100th, Michigan, over normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/101st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #34 South Michigan buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 101st, State, 100th, Michigan, over normal route, due to street blockage near Michigan/101st.

Headline: Purple Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running but will board and exit via the Southbound platform due to track switching problems.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running but will board and exit via the Southbound platform due to track switching problems. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore normal service. Allow extra travel time.
